articles.title: Drake Seemingly Responds To Kendrick Lamar's "Euphoria" Diss
articles.description: Drake and Kendrick Lamar do not like each other, and the recent track "Euphoria" was a great example of that.
articles.content: Drake got dissed today as Kendrick Lamar finally offered up his response to "Push Ups." Overall, "Euphoria" is taking the world by storm in a big way. It is all that people want to talk about today. Every other story in the hip-hop world has been put... [1798 chars]

articles.description: Ralph Lauren has been known for many a grand fashion show over the years: taking over Central Park for a sumptuous anniversary celebration, for example, or staging a runway show amid his eye-popping classic car collection.

articles.title: Republican lawmakers tell Biden to get off TikTok
articles.description: Sen. Joni Ernst (R-Iowa) and Rep. Troy Nehls (R-Texas) urged President Biden on Monday to lead by example and suspend his campaign’s use of TikTok over the threat to national security posed by the Chinese-owned app.
